column1: Little Goat Diner////This was fine but not as interesting or good as I was expecting. Certainly
column2: I knew that it would be an entirely different experience than G&tG
column3: but I was hoping the same melding of delicious flavors and playful recipes would be in play. We did get interesting-sounding dishes but in the end they were just okay
column4: and priced as though they were excellent. Would I go again? Probably
column6: but I wouldn't make a destination out of it again.
